JOB DESCRIPTION:
Essential Job Duties and Responsibilities: 
      Specific responsibilities include designing, documenting, implementing and refactoring software applications and components 
     Writing requirement and design specifications 
     Interacting with client services staff to help diagnosing and correct customer problems 
 Education and Experience: 
     Graduation in Computer Science or a related field or equivalent experience
     5  years of software development experience
     3  years of programming with C  /VC  
 Necessary Knowledge: 
     C  /VC   development experience is required
     MFC, Win32 API development experience is required
     Experience implementing DICOM based applications desirable
     Experience with STL, COM/DCOM/ATL/ActiveX Technologies is desirable
     Experience with Image rendering and transforming algorithms desirable
     Knowledge of the design and implementation of image display systems is a plus
     Ability to design and implement high-quality software applications and components
     Ability to work with team and independently with excellent problem solving skills in a fast-paced environment
     Good verbal and written communication skills
